content: join with a slip_stitch into third turning chain 12 shells 24 fpdc round 10-20 repeat row 9 edging all sizes edging round ch1 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet around the entire edge as following one single_crochet in the top of each double_crochet and fpdc 2sc into each chain-space for a near-invisible finish after making a single_crochet in the last st which should be a fpdc cut the yarn leaving a tail of at least 4 inches thread the tail onto a needle and pass it under both loops of the ch1 from the start of the edging round bring it back up and insert the needle in the middle of the last single_crochet and pull the yarn snug but not too tight finish by weaving in the ends and putting it on someones head the copyright of this pattern remains with myself it is provided free for personal use only the pattern may not be reproduced for commercial purposes if you want to sell the product made from this pattern ask me first and it does not hurt to ask so that you do not break copyright laws
